visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Production
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted rice production values

insights: Model achieves 98.3% R-squared but has 16.34% MAPE. Predictions show consistent underestimation (positive bias). Only 3 prediction samples available for evaluation.
data.summary: High accuracy model with significant prediction error. Requires more data validation for long-term forecasting reliability.
data.task_answer: The model can forecast rice production with high accuracy (RÂ²=0.983) but has a 16.34% average error. Predictions tend to be conservative (underestimates). With only 3 samples evaluated, more data is needed to validate reliability for 5-year forecasts.
